005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
016
017import java.util.List;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020
021/**
022 * Implements the XPath 3.1
023 * <a href= "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-head">fn:head</a>
024 * function.
025 */
026public final class FnHead {
027  private static final String NAME = "head";
028  @NonNull
029  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
030      .name(NAME)
031      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
032      .deterministic()
033      .contextIndependent()
034      .focusIndependent()
035      .argument(IArgument.builder()
036          .name("arg")
037          .type(IItem.class)
038          .zeroOrMore()
039          .build())
040      .returnType(IItem.class)
041      .returnZeroOrOne()
042      .functionHandler(FnHead::execute)
043      .build();
044
045  private FnHead() {
046    // disable construction
047  }
048
049  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
050  @NonNull
051  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
052      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
053      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
054      IItem focus) {
055    ISequence<?> items = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
056    return ISequence.of(fnHead(items));
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Return the first item in the {@code sequence}.
061   *
062   * @param sequence
063   *          the sequence to check
064   * @return {@code IItem} first item in the sequence for a sequence {@code null}
065   *         otherwise no item is returned
066   */
067  public static IItem fnHead(List<? extends IItem> sequence) {
068    return sequence.isEmpty() ? null : sequence.get(0);
069  }
070}
